item.description:
At first i thought a hike in Bolton to the 2 caves, spraying our names on the rocks at the top of the mountain, and making the tunnel roar would have been good..but due to the rain and the slippery ground and wind, that event will be posted soon...so look around for some old spray paint ....


Old Historic Wethersfield is a quiet town with some pretty interesting houses.
There are the scare crows in town too on old main street..see if you can scare them..

This event is the best i can offer for those who wanted the camping trip but were not enthuasitc about the wind conditions either.

I think its just easier to meet at AL's Shack first, do a walk through the town then relax in the sun and make some food for the afternoon/evening ..etc

There is some wine left, and the little fire pit works great outdoors for the later fireside chat .


Ok getting to AL's Shack


321 Silas Deane Highway in Wethersfield..(the map link above is accurate enough VISUALLY) BUT BE CAREFUL OF MAPQUEST DIRECTIONS..use them for visual puropses..

its a business section but i have one of the last 12 or so residential houses on the street..(the 5th or 6th one down on the right or west side) ...

from hartford area take 84 east to 91 south...take exit #28 (same exit number for either 91 north or south)..its the 5/15 exit to wethersfield..from there take the next exit #85 on to (rte 99 south= Silas Deane Hwy) , take right off exit..you cant turn left anyway here..go strait (south)on Silas Deane hwy ..Landmarks=pass Murcury Oil Gas Satation on right, Price Right store on left and ...further a police station and Drunkin donuts...2 streets on right cumberland st then oxford st....now..on the left is a bunch of businesses..the medium bright medium-blue house is a hair dresser shop..im directly across from it in a small off white little ranch...
On the mail box on the side of the house the #321 is in orange/red...
I will put 2 traffic cones on the end of the driveway on the posts...and the glow in the dark SNOWMAN right in the front yard...
they will stick out im sure......

Pull way into the back yard...
Im parked at the house next door... you can park there too

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Walk In Old Historic Wethersfield and Simple Pot Luck Dinner at AL's Shack
